text: "The oldest still functioning car in germany. Just hope i’ll survive the ride home."
The sign is barely legible, the color faded and covered in years of bad weather. But one thing can still be seen =SANATORIUM SALZBERG -> 200m
"Oh good, I’m actually on the right way."
A bloodchilling scream echoes behind you and the exit locks.
Somewhere in this building you hear a furious scream.
"OUR THREE HEARTS WERE HIDDEN IN THIS CURSE PLACE, FIND THEM AND RETURN THEM TO US OR YOU SHALL NOT ESCAPE THIS PLACE"
"WE LEND YOU THE POWER TO VIEW THE PAST, LOOK FOR THEM THERE"
A vent. It reeks of blood and looks like something has forced its way through recently.
Most of the detail is lost, but it looks like an old movie poster, featuring a large cross on a burial hill.
"GRAVEYARD GAMBIT". Wow, you bet that title would sound absolutely idiotic in german. BUY THIS GAME! NOW ON STEAM!
A ridiculous dinosaur runs away from a large, dangerous looking dinosaur. You can see a few parallels to your current situation.
The title DINO-MITE is now clearly visible. Seems like someone here was a fan. PLAY THIS GAME TOO!
